title: Photo Watchface
description: Choose any picture from your gallery, setup the time display with simple parameters, and your watchface is ready !Photo Watchface is the simpliest way to customize your Android Wear watch with the pictures you want.
descriptionHTML:
Choose any picture from your gallery, setup the time display with simple parameters, and your watchface is ready !

Photo Watchface is the simpliest way to customize your Android Wear watch with the pictures you want.
comments: Works Great Best of the photo watch faces that I have found. The time can be moved, resized and color/transparency adjusted to best display your photo and remain useful. I'm using it with an Asus ZenWatch and displaying Halloween wallpapers downloaded from Zedge for the month of October.
Doesn't work  Choosing a picture doesn't change it on the watch (Huawei Watch)
Lovely app. Works well with my MOTO 360 2nd gen watch. I will give you a 5 STAR
How to open it? The screen only show uninstall
Huawei Watch issuss When I chose the photo for the watch face, it just presented with a black screen. Running Android 7.1. Huawei Watch.
